meanings.meaning: 1. action; behavior; behaviour; move
2. recommendation (of a person for a position) Archaic, See also 推挙
1. to raise; to elevate See also 手を挙げる質問があれば右手を挙げて下さい。If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
2. to do up (one's hair) See also 髪を上げる髪も上げたほうが私は好きだ。I also prefer it with the hair worn up.
3. to fly (a kite, etc.); to launch (fireworks, etc.); to surface (a submarine, etc.) 花火が四方八方であげられた。The fireworks were set off on all sides.
4. to land (a boat) 彼らはその船を岸にあげた。They drew the boat on the beach.
5. to deep-fry Only applies to 揚げるこの鶏肉はよく揚げられている。This chicken is fried well.
6. to show someone (into a room)
7. to give Polite (teineigo) language, Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 上げるあなたは時には妹さんにおこづかいをあげますか。Do you sometimes give your sister money?
8. to send someone (away)
9. to enrol (one's child in school); to enroll
10. to increase (price, quality, status, etc.); to develop (talent, skill); to improve その店は値段を全部上げた。The store raised all the prices.
11. to make (a loud sound); to raise (one's voice) See also 声を上げる彼は悲鳴をあげて逃げて行った。He cried out and ran away.
12. to earn (something desirable) 彼は立派な成績を上げた。He got wonderful results.
13. to praise
14. to give (an example, etc.); to cite usu. 挙げる記者：例を１つあげてくださいますか。Reporter: Can you give me an example?
15. to summon up (all of one's energy, etc.) usu. 挙げる全力をあげてたたかえ。Fight with all your might.
16. to arrest Only applies to 挙げる
17. to nominate Only applies to 挙げる私は考えられる候補者としてポールの名を挙げた。I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
18. to summon (for geishas, etc.) Usually written using kana alone, Only applies to 揚げる
19. to offer up (incense, a prayer, etc.) to the gods (or Buddha, etc.) Only applies to 上げる
20. to bear (a child)
21. to conduct (a ceremony, esp. a wedding) usu. 挙げる私は先月結婚式を挙げました。I held a wedding ceremony last month.
22. (of the tide) to come in

meanings.type: Ichidan verb, Intransitive verb, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 23. to vomit
24. to do for (the sake of someone else) Usually written using kana alone, Polite (teineigo) language, after the -te form of a verb解き方を教えてあげるよ。I will show you how to solve it.
25. to complete ... See also 作り上げる, after the -masu stem of a verb
26. to humbly do ... Humble (kenjougo) language, See also 申し上げる, after the -masu stem of a humble verb to increase the level of humility
27. Deep frying Deep frying is a cooking method in which food is submerge... Read more

sentences.translation: If you have a question, please raise your right hand.
I also prefer it with the hair worn up.
The fireworks were set off on all sides.
They drew the boat on the beach.
This chicken is fried well.
Do you sometimes give your sister money?
The store raised all the prices.
He cried out and ran away.
He got wonderful results.
Reporter: Can you give me an example?
Fight with all your might.
I put Paul's name forward as a possible candidate.
I held a wedding ceremony last month.
I will show you how to solve it.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to rise; to go up; to come up; to ascend; to be raised Antonym: 下がる３月１日から鉄道運賃が１割あがると発表された。It has been announced that railway fares will be raised by 10 percent starting on the first of March.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to enter (esp. from outdoors); to come in; to go in

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to enter (a school); to advance to the next grade

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to get out (of water); to come ashore 軽くひと泳ぎした僕は、水から上がってプールサイドに腰を下ろす。After a light swim, I came up from the water and sat down on the poolside.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to increase also written as 騰る in ref. to price来月タクシー料金があがります。Taxi fares will go up next month.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to improve; to make progress

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to be promoted; to advance

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to be made (of profit, etc.) ここからあがる所得は無税である。The income from this source is tax-free.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to occur (esp. of a favourable result)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to be adequate (to cover expenses, etc.) often as 〜で上がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to be finished; to be done; to be over 「要さんって、何時にあがれます？」「終わりまでだから八時までかかるわ」"Kaname, when can you leave?" "It's till closing so it takes till eight."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to stop (of rain); to lift 「雨がすぐあがるでしょうか」「あがらないと思うよ」"Will it stop raining soon?" "I'm afraid not."

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to stop (working properly); to cut out; to give out; to die 翌日、またバッテリーが上がってる。The next day the battery was flat again.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to win (in a card game, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to be arrested Only applies to 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to turn up (of evidence, etc.) Only applies to 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to be deep fried Only applies to 揚がる恵一、天ぷら揚がったから、皿持って来い。Keiichi, the tempura's done, so bring a plate.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 18. to be spoken loudly 政府が今国会への改正案提出の見送り方針を固めたことを歓迎する一方、小泉首相が提出断念を明言していない点を警戒する声も上がった。While welcoming the firming up of the present government policy to abandon the proposal of the reform bill to the Diet, at the same time some are worried that Prime Minister Koizumi won't clearly state the bill's withdrawal.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 19. to get nervous; to get stage fright esp. アガる私は演説をすると決まってあがる。I never make a speech without being nervous.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 20. to be offered (to the gods, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 21. to go; to visit Humble (kenjougo) language明日それをいただきに上がります。I will call for it tomorrow.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 22. to eat; to drink Honorific or respectful (sonkeigo) language

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 23. to be listed (as a candidate) esp. 挙がる

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 24. to serve (in one's master's home)
25. to be complete; to finish See also 出来上がる, after the -masu stem of a verb
26. above; north of as ～上ル; in the Kyoto address system
揚がる 【あがる】、挙がる 【あがる】、上る 【あがる】
上る: Irregular okurigana usage.

sentences.translation: It has been announced that railway fares will be raised by 10 percent starting on the first of March.
After a light swim, I came up from the water and sat down on the poolside.
Taxi fares will go up next month.
The income from this source is tax-free.
"Kaname, when can you leave?" "It's till closing so it takes till eight."
"Will it stop raining soon?" "I'm afraid not."
The next day the battery was flat again.
Keiichi, the tempura's done, so bring a plate.

While welcoming the firming up of the present government policy to abandon the proposal of the reform bill to the Diet, at the same time some are worried that Prime Minister Koizumi won't clearly state the bill's withdrawal.
I never make a speech without being nervous.
I will call for it tomorrow.
